lead_paragraph: McKENNEY--Charles Emerson, passed away peacefully March 1, 2016, in hospice near his home in West Palm Beach. Born February 28, 1932, son of Maurice and Florence of Summit. Pingry '50, Yale '54, University of Virginia Law '59. Naval officer. Patent law partner at Pennie & Edmonds in New York. Raised three children in Darien. Member of Shinnecock, Devon Yacht Club, and the Beach Club (Palm Beach). He is survived by his wife of 53 years, Helaine ("Bobo"), daughter Hobby (Matt) Coudert, sons Wensley (Christine) and Philip, and grandchildren Preston and Emerson McKenney and Matthew and Charlotte Coudert. Memorial services will be held in Palm Beach (this spring) and the Hamptons (this summer). 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MCKENNEY, CHARLES EMERSON
